review: It was super easy to install.  I get lots of free movies and games.  If a 72 year old grandmother can install it in less than 30 minutes, anyone can.  The picture and sound quality is very good and I have had no streaming problems. It actually works as good as my smart tv.
author: Jaded Jade

review: We purchased the firestick because of the promise of the free movies on Prime. Wow, we were so disappointed with the selection - I couldn't believe it. Well, we can still join Netflix for a reasonable price, so I guess that's a consolation. Was really hoping for something better. Sorry I can't give it a better recommendation.
